Package net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api.config

Contains the API of the configurations for the search-indexer.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfiguredSearchIndexerOptions
    This is the interface for the additional options to use for the ConfiguredSearchIndexer.
    SearchIndexerConfiguration
    This is the interface for the configuration of the SearchIndexer.
    SearchIndexerConfigurationHolder
    This is the SearchConfigurationHolder for the SearchIndexerConfiguration.
    SearchIndexerConfigurationLoader
    This is the SearchConfigurationLoader for the SearchIndexerConfiguration.
    SearchIndexerDataLocation
    This is the interface for the configuration of a data-location that should be indexed by the indexer and is then available for search via the SearchEngine.
    SearchIndexerSource
    This is the interface extends SearchSource with configuration required for the search-indexer.

Package net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api.config Description

Contains the API of the configurations for the search-indexer.

Search-Indexer Configuration API

This package contains the API of configurations for the search-indexer. This API is not intended for end-users.
